descriptions.index: Current domains and configured capability integrations
descriptions.capabilities: Manage the capabilities associated with application domains
descriptions.integrations: Edit current integrations or add new integration

domains.alert: Deleting a domain will delete any associated child capabilities

capabilities.description: Use the tree structure to view and delete capabilities
capabilities.note: Note: You cannot delete capabilities which have active integrations

integrations.integrationHashDescription: Use the hash in your integration code
integrations.successCriteriaDescription: Success criteria depends on the specific integration. For example it could be a number (such as %) or boolean (true/false, yes/no)
